title: Setting Up Web Project using Next.js, Tailwind and Storybook
excerpt: Next.js  and  Tailwind  are popular frameworks in modern web development. I’ve used them in some projects and really happy with the result.   Storybook  is one library to create component documentation which can be integrated to project written in many UI...

text.content: When our project grows and we have a lot of components, making sure there’s no duplication becomes harder if we don’t have proper component documentation. Storybook is a library to create component documentation. It can be integrated to project written in many UI libraries and provides useful functionalities.

rich_text.plain_text: When our project grows and we have a lot of components, making sure there’s no duplication becomes harder if we don’t have proper component documentation.
